question: do we have to wear long sleeve shirts when we pray(SALAT) or half sleevs shirts are okay.
answer:
QUESTION
do we have to wear long sleeve shirts when we pray(SALAT) or half sleevs shirts are okay. JAZAKALLAH KAHIR

ANSWER


Share:

It is Makrooh (disliked) to perform Salaat with half sleeved shirt. The entire hand till the wrists should be covered.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
